kv20.2:1.3: Natthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti?
kv20.2:1.5: nanu atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
kv20.2:1.8: Hañci atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo …pe…
kv20.2:1.9: paccupalakkhaṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:2.5: Hañci puthujjano paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:3.12: Hañci puthujjano gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ dadeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:4.3: Puthujjano tena ñāṇena dukkhaṁ parijānāti, samudayaṁ pajahati, nirodhaṁ sacchikaroti, maggaṁ bhāvetīti?
